Module com.cab302.wellbeing.model
Package com.cab302.wellbeing.controller

Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
com.cab302.wellbeing.controller.MainMenuController
public class MainMenuController extends Object
This class is responsible for controlling the main menu. It provides functionalities such as switching scenes, logging out, and applying color themes.
